extendedInfo.description: Moon Phase Widget displays the current phase of the moon in a small 2x2 widget.  Along with an icon, it will show the name of the phase and what percentage is visible.  This is calculated real time and updates itself hourly.Also, the widget will display the moon rise and set times for your current location, if your device has location information available.  To conserve battery, it does not actively use GPS.Other features:	If you tap on the widget, the current month will be displayed showing the phase of the moon at midnight.  You may swipe left or right on the month at a glance, and it will change to the next or previous months.   This is a continuous calendar.Limitations:	Due to wobble and accuracy limitations, the rise and set times may be up to 20 mins off.This is an ad supported version.

reviews.title: Excellent, but.. please fix
reviews.comment: This app is very well designed. The widget shows current moon phase and gives written info on visible percentage, the rise and set times. And when you tap on the widget a month view opens. Only, the data are wrong. I suppose it runs late by day or two. Mine showed 20% illumination on the day when it was actually 10% (Samsung GS3 mini). Please fix this and it will definitely be a 5 star app.
reviews.author: Tana Pekic

reviews.title: wrong moon phase icon
reviews.comment: the widget show the icon from the backwards(for norther hemisphere) and no setings option to change that
reviews.author: Fede Rico

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: The app is wonderful. Best moon phase widget around. Would have given it 5 stars if it showed the full moon and new moon on the right day instead of the day before
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.comment: I wanted a simple app with a widget that showed the correct moon phase.  This is it!

reviews.title: It is an APP TOO!
reviews.comment: This app actually does open, so its not just a widget! It constantly changes the date of the full moon and is usually wrong. I do like the simplicity of this app & hope for a more accurate fix. HTC EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: All details
reviews.comment: Gives you rise and set timings so pretty useful if you like moonlit dinners or turtle watching

reviews.title: moon phase widget
reviews.comment: It really gives me everything I needed, but not everything I wanted.  I had hoped the moon phase picture that\'s on my phone\'s screen would fill a complete page, so I could more easily see it at a glance.  work in sporting goods and thought it could e a good talking point.  Doc

reviews.title: C\'mon people!!!
reviews.comment: This is a widget NOT an app. It\'s not supposed to open. You add it to a home screen. Learn to use your phone before you start badmouthing.  There is some issue today however with its accuracy. Until this tme an excellent little widget. Im sure a fix is forthcoming. Very responsive author!!
